answers.answer: My close family has diabetes as well! I didn't eat sweets the day / morning of my test because those sweets can make your sugar levels go wayy up and they'll make you take a 3hr test. So I advise you no sweets the day before or the morning of the test! Don't worry:)
I have mine next Friday & I'm worried. My husband do grandpa has it
I have it...it's not so bad just have to watch what I eat and check my blood sugar 4 times a day
My dad grandfather and grandmother have diabetes and my fiance mom has itand both his parents have heart failure just like my grandfather did

question: Has anyone had this during their pregnancy? I have to take the screening early at 15 weeks. I'm worried that I may have it just because of close family having diabetes :(
title: gestational diabetes
